trans-unit.source: Wraps marshal-by-value object references, allowing them to be returned through an indirection.
trans-unit.target: Bryter formidling av verdien objektreferanser, slik at de skal returneres via en omadressering.

trans-unit.source: The ObjectHandle class is used to pass an object (in a wrapped state) between multiple application domains without loading the metadata for the wrapped object in each <xref:System.AppDomain> through which the ObjectHandle travels.
trans-unit.target: Klassen ObjectHandle brukes til å sende et objekt (i en innpakket tilstand) mellom flere programdomener uten å laste inn metadataene for innpakket objektet i hver <xref:System.AppDomain>via ObjectHandle følger.</xref:System.AppDomain>

trans-unit.source: Thus, the ObjectHandle class gives the caller control of when the <xref:System.Type> of the remote object is loaded into a domain.
trans-unit.target: Derfor klassen ObjectHandle Gir oppringer-kontroll på når den <xref:System.Type>det eksterne objektet er lastet inn i et domene.</xref:System.Type>

trans-unit.source: Initializes an instance of the class, wrapping the given object o.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en forekomst av den klassen wrapping det angitte objektet o .

trans-unit.source: The object that is wrapped by the new <xref href="System.Runtime.Remoting.ObjectHandle"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Objektet som er pakket med det nye <xref href="System.Runtime.Remoting.ObjectHandle"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Initializes the lifetime lease of the wrapped object.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer levetid leasingavtalen for innpakket objektet.

trans-unit.source: An initialized <xref href="System.Runtime.Remoting.Lifetime.ILease"></xref> that allows you to control the lifetime of the wrapped object.
trans-unit.target: En initialisert <xref href="System.Runtime.Remoting.Lifetime.ILease"> </xref> som lar deg kontrollere levetiden for innpakket objektet.
